events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store but it doesn't fit well. I would like to request a refund for this item as soon as possible.
The reported issue has been identified as a refund request related to a product that did not meet the customer's expectations.
The case has been assigned to customer support agent Helen R. who will assist with the refund process.
Hello! I’m Helen from customer support. I understand you’d like to request a refund for your jacket. I’m here to help you resolve this quickly.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is still unused with tags intact to proceed with the refund?
Thank you for getting back to me. The order number is 123456789, and yes, the jacket is unused and still has all the original tags attached.
Great, thank you for the confirmation. I have initiated the refund process. You will receive the full amount back within 5-7 business days once we receive the returned jacket.
Thanks for the prompt response and clear instructions. I appreciate the quick help with my refund request.
Your refund request has been successfully processed. Please ship the jacket back using the prepaid label sent to your email.
Just checking in to confirm if you have received the refund or if you need any further assistance with your return.
Yes, I received the refund today. Everything went smoothly, and I’m happy with the service. Thanks again!
We are glad to hear that the refund was received. Closing your case now. Feel free to reach out if you need anything else.
